channel.title: Wahiawa on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Wahiawa on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Ray's Kiawe Broiled Chicken
item.description: We had just visited the Dole Plantation, and our next planned stop was to checkout this “word of mouth” BBQ chicken mobile that is similar along the same veins of the shrimp trucks. Be aware that there are 3 locations that this van goes to. This one that we went to is located in a gas station and is open on Tuesdays and Fridays. As a reference point if you are a tourist like me, this is located south of the Dole Plantation.
